thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com | 4 of 209
thread.title: Richard Lovell

author: Richard Lovell
title: Richard Lovell
text:
The course was easy to pick up and the website always remembered my progress so I could do as little or as much as was convenient at the time. Most of the lessons were short and contained just a few new points so they were easier to take in and remember. If I had any queries, customer services were quick and helpful.
I would recommend this company to anyone who wants to learn from home at their own pace.
